name: Day & Night System
description: Adds a day and night system in the GD menus!

enable-sunrise.name: Sunrise Event
enable-sunrise.description: Enable/Disable the sunrise event. (Disabling this will just be normal GD)

enable-sunset.name: Sunset Event
enable-sunset.description: Enable/Disable the sunset event. (Disabling this will just be normal GD)

enable-night.name: Night Event
enable-night.description: Enable/Disable the night event. (Disabling this will just be normal GD)

enable-dark.name: Dark Event
enable-dark.description: Enable/Disable the dark event. (Disabling this will just be normal GD)

enable-dark-overlay-night.name: Dark Overlay In Night Event
enable-dark-overlay-night.description: Enable/Disable the dark overlay during the night event.

enable-dark-overlay-dark.name: Dark Overlay In Dark Event
enable-dark-overlay-dark.description: Enable/Disable the dark overlay during the dark event.
